named-query.name: READ_GIFT_BY_PERSON
named-query.query: SELECT gift FROM com.mpower.domain.Gift gift WHERE gift.person.id = :personId ORDER BY gift.transactionDate desc

named-query.name: ANALYZE_FOR_MAJOR_DONOR
named-query.query: SELECT SUM(gift.value) FROM com.mpower.domain.Gift gift WHERE (gift.person.id = :personId AND (gift.transactionDate BETWEEN :beginDate AND :currentDate))
